title: Thank you SO MUCH, Riot!
body: Scrolling through the patch notes the last thing I expected to see was my girl Lulu getting anything new. But as it turns out she got one of the most frustrating of her bugs fixed! I feel that Polymorph is a huge spell that I can use to completely remove an enemy's damage for a little bit (which is so helpful against bursty champs). But it always sucked when I used it on Kalista and I would still see my ally melt away (although see a little seal hop like that was pretty ok). So THANK YOU for fixing Kalista's magical immunity to being a squirrel.

replies.body: nice man  im planning on getting her next
